当客户端安装数量较大时，可以利用网络展开功能，创建自定义安装包。该安装包可设置是否静默安装，安装路径和浮动授权的服务器信息。客户端用此安装包后，无需在对浮动授权进行设置，从而简化客户端安装过程。 安装过程如下所示： 注意：本文中的示例图，均以中望3D 2025 截图演示 双击打开中望3D安装包，进入安装程序。单击 网络展开 即可进行安装。 选择 开始 。 输入 网络共享文件夹 路径。 如果需要静默安装，勾选 分发后客户端以静默方式进行程序的安装 的选项 在 输入安装目录 设置客户端安装软件的路径。 注意： 安装路径不允许有非ASCII字符 完成上述设置后，选择 创建展开，等待文件拷贝完成即可。 此时其他电脑访问共享文件夹，运行 Setup.exe 即可实现静默安装。

When there are many clients, you can use to create custom installation. This package can be configured to install silently, install path and float authorized server information. Clients can use this package to simplify the client installation process by eliminating the need to set up floating licenses.

If you have already installed another version of the same year and then perform a silent install, the installed version will be uninstalled and the silent installed version will be reinstalled. ZW3D does not support writing floating authorization during silent installation, and you can only add authorization by yourself after installation.

此命令根据一个视图方向在所选面的投影轮廓处创建分型线。
This command creates parting lines at the projected silhouette of selected faces based on a viewing direction.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
方向 - 选择提取分型线的方向。
Direction - Select the direction to extract the parting lines from.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
面 - 选取创建分型线的面，或单击鼠标中键选取零件中所有面。
Faces - Select the faces to create parting lines from or middle-click for all faces in the part.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
曲线类型 - 选择返回的曲线类型。环 - 返回轮廓和边的封闭环，其中该边为：其法线相对于开模方向由向前变为向后的面的边。 轮廓 - 返回所有轮廓曲线（除了其法线相对于开模方向由向前变为向后的面的边）。 所有 - 返回所有轮廓曲线，以及其法线相对于开模方向由向前变为向后的面的边。

Curve type - Select the type of curves to return. Loops - Closed loops of silhouette curves and edges which border faces with normals changing from forward to backward (FB edge) relative the mold pull direction are returned. Silhouette - All silhouette curves (but no FB edges) are returned. All - all silhouette and FB edges are returned.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
角度公差 - 设定用于检查配对边的相切连续性的角度公差。
Angle tol - Set the angle tolerance used to check for tangent continuity along the mating edges.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
连接平面上的曲线 - 如上述曲线类型设定为环, 用户可以勾选此框，尝试在一个公共平面上把环连接起来（如果有一个以上的环）。
Join curves on plane - If Curve type above is set to Loops, you can check this box to attempt to connect the loops (if there is more than one loop) on a common plane.

该命令可在一个或多个基准平面(面)与选择面的相交处创建分型线。如果基准平面或面在配对边与两个面相交，在相交的边仅创建一条分型线。

This command creates parting lines at the intersection of one or more datum planes (faces) and selected faces. If the datum planes or faces intersect two faces at their mating edges, only one parting line is created for the intersecting edges.

Intersecting - Select the set of planes or faces that the base face will intersect.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
基体 - 选取接收分型线的面，或点击中键选取所有面。新的分型线将会与这些面关联。
Base - Select the faces to receive the parting lines or middle-click for all faces. The new parting lines will be associated with these faces.

该命令可从面边界创建分型线。
This command creates parting lines from face edges.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
面 - 选取得到分型线的基础面。 如果用户选择一个面并且点击“确定”，则用户可以获得所选面的所有边。如果用户选择两个相邻面，则用户可以获得由所选面外部各边组成的一条封闭环状分型线。

Faces - Select the base faces to derive parting lines from. If you select a face and hit OK you will get all edges of the selected face. If you select two adjacent faces you will get a closed loop of parting lines for the outside edges.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
边 - 选取分型线曲线的边，或单击鼠标中键，选取选定面的所有边界边。用户无需选取面。
Edges - Select the edges for parting line curves or middle-click for all boundary edges of the selected faces. You don't necessarily need to pick faces.

该命令在一个或多个面的起点与终点间的创建分型线。如果点位于不同的面，在两点间会创建一个虚拟平面，且两点间的曲面法线用于确定平面的方位。

This command creates parting lines between a start and end point that lie on one or more faces. If the points lie on different faces, an imaginary plane is created between the two points and the average surface normal between the points is use to orient the plane.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
分型线将位于该平面与面间的相交处。用户可以使用轨迹点选项进一步控制平面的方位。
The parting lines will lie on the intersection between the plane and the faces. You can use the Plane Point option to further control the plane orientation.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
面选择分型线起点所在的面。
Face Select the face that the start point of the parting line lies on.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
开始确定起点。该点须位于上述选择的面上。
Start Specify the start point. The point must lie on the face selected above.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
面选择分型线终点所在的面，或中击选择前面选择的起始面。该面不必一定是相邻面。用户可让分型线跨越多个面。

Face Select the face that the end point of the parting line lies on or middle-click to select the same face as the starting face selected above. This does not have to be an adjacent face. You can have the parting line span multiple faces.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
结束确定终点。该点须位于上述选择的面上。如果两个或两个以上的面位于起点与终点之间，则它们须是同一造型的一部分，且中间无缝隙。
End Specify the end point. The point must lie on the face selected above. If two or more faces lie between the start and end points, they must all be part of the same shape and with no gaps.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
面、起点相切与终点相切选项仅在两点位于相同面时才可使用。
The Face, Start tan and End tan options are only used if the two points lie on the same face.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
起点切向，终点切向, 权重使用这些选项来确定开始与结束时分型线的切线方向。新的分型线将会与确定的方向保持相切。如果表示方向的是另一条线，新的分型线将会与其相切。如果确定了起点和/或终点相切的方向，也要确定每个方向的权重，该权重值将新分型线拉近到指定的方向。因此，权重值越高，方向会越近。用户可以进行设置，以获得所要的结果。可以点击鼠标中键跳过此选项。

Start tan, End tan, Weight Use these options to specify start and end tangent directions for the parting line. The new parting line will be constrained tangent to the directions specified. If the direction is another line, the new parting line will be tangent with it. If Start and/or End tan directions are specified, also specify the Weight for each direction. The Weight value "pulls" the new parting line closer in the specified direction. So, the higher the Weight value, the closer to the direction it will be. Experiment to get the desired results. You can middle-click to skip this option.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
使用最小素线路径选择线应遵循的路径方式。
Use minimum iso path Select the method for determining the path a line should follow.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
轨迹点 只有当起点与终点位于不同面时才使用此选项。此选项让用户选择第三点给相交平面定位，分型线将位于此相交面上。参考前面的命令描述。

Path Point Only use this option if the start and end points lie on different faces. It allows you to select a third point to locate the plane of intersection along which the parting lines will be located. Refer to the command description above.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.

The graphical markers listed below will indicate any endpoints that are over or under matched.

The markers are removed with a middle-click of the mouse. For a complex part it is not always easy to see the markers. A message similar to the following is also displayed indicating the quantity of conditions found:

You can create your own icons for a User Toolbar as long as you place them in the "supp" folder of your user directory. They should be in the Windows Bitmap (*.bmp) format or *.PNG format. The recommended icon sizes include 16x16 and 32x32 pixels. The icon background color should be transparent and the top left pixel in each icon should be the background color. To use your icon instead of a button, enter its file name in the Label field (e.g., my_icon.bmp).

One scenario that may clarify why you would want to set this is, if you have two shapes in the same part. An extrude cut does not require the user to select a shape to operate on so the default is that the cut will act on whatever it intersect and keep them as separate shapes. If the "Merge" command is "on" then the two shapes will be added together before the extrude cut is calculated.

使用这个命令来创建一个完全包围激活零件的单一面或者整个造型的拉伸坯料特征。必选的输入包括要包围的造型以及用于定向品坯料的参考平面。默认情况下，坯料的大小等于外形的范围。

Use this command to create an extruded stock feature that completely encloses a single face or the entire shape of the active part. The required inputs include the shape(s) to enclose and a reference plane to orient the stock. By default, the size of the stock equals the extents of the shape.

The optional inputs include the ability to specify the exact size of the stock, additional plus/minus modifiers, an incremental step size value and the ability to assign a unique name to the feature if desired. If the extent of the part changes, the stock feature will adapt accordingly during the next regen of the part's history.

坯料长度(X)，坯料宽度(Y)，坯料高度(Z)，坯料半径如果您设置了坯料增量（见下文），这些字段会根据新的坯料的尺寸进行动态更新。如果把坯料增量设为0（零），那么会显示零件的实际尺寸（即零件的范围）。 用户也可以通过改变这些字段的值来为坯料长度(X)，坯料宽度(Y)，坯料高度(Z)或者坯料半径设置精确的大小。然而一旦某个字段重写后，这个数值就固定了，不会再发生动态更新。

Stock Length (X), Width (Y), Height (Z), Radius If you set the Side increment (see below), these fields will dynamically update with the new stock dimensions. If you set the side increment to 0 (zero), the actual dimensions of the part (i.e., part extents) are displayed. You can also enter an exact size for either of the Length (X), Width (Y), Height (Z) or Radius of the stock by changing the value in one or all of these fields. However, once a field is overwritten, it is "fixed" and will no longer dynamically update.

Side increment An increment (i.e., step size) may be specified so that all lengths will be rounded up. Numbers can be rounded to the nearest ones, the nearest ten, the nearest hundred, the nearest thousand, and so on. If for example, your standard stock sizes run in 10 mm increments, you can use this field to round up to the nearest standard size. DO NOT CHANGE THIS VALUE AND THE +/- NUMBERS FOR THE LENGTH, WIDTH AND HEIGHT AT THE SAME TIME.

Part tables, libraries and mold bases ZW3D provides many options for creating families of parts (Part Tables) and inserting standard parts and mold bases from libraries. Here are some options: Select Utilities > Part Table to open or create a Part Table. Select Utilities > Part Library to create a component from a ZW3D Part Library. By default, ZW3D Part Library files are located in the "/part_libraries" directory of your ZW3D installation folder. This directory contains ANSI and DME standard components.

Lines 7, 8, and 9 define the part table parameters that the user must select in order to identify the part variation they want created by the Part Library tool. This is defined with the syntax "input = field Label, variable Name, default Value". field Label is the text label used to identify the required input on the Part Library GUI. variable Name identifies the driving variable from Line 15 for which the user must select a particular value. default Value is optional. If used, it should identify a valid value for the specified variable - that is, a value that exists in the table for a particular part variable. default Value must be specified with the same text that is used in the part table. Up to six "input" fields can be specified.

任何历史操作的文本或数字输入字段，可以通过使用“变量”名称从零件表中抽取出来，使用下面的语法： history_operation_name:field_number 如果将文本指定给“字符串”输入字段，标记后应该跟着“$” 字符；如果将一个值指定给“距离”输入字段，用“@”字符；如果将一个值指定给“角度”输入字段，用“^” 字符；如果输入字段是无量纲数值，则不要字符。

Any text or numeric input field of a history operation can be driven from a Part Table using a "variable" name with the following syntax: history_operation_name:field_number This label should be followed by a "$" character if it is used to assign text to a "string" input field; a "@" character if it assigns a value to a "distance" input field; a "^" character if it assigns a value to an "angle" input field; no character if it assigns a dimensionless value to a numeric input field.

在历史管理器中，可以右键单击某一操作，选择“查询”并点击它的“参数数据”字段，查看驱动此操作的输入字段。检查与历史操作相关联的命令模板，是了解驱动该操作的输入类型和用于识别输入的字段编号的另一个方法。 例如，“激活备选组件”操作的字段5是包含备选组件名称的字段。假设历史记录有一个名为“AltComp1_Activate”的操作，该操作激活一个指定的备选组件。可以在零件表的驱动参数列表中使用“ $”。该项下方的列将包含每个派生零件使用的备选组件的名称。 同样的操作可以用于改变如孔特征的“顶锥角”，或与某一操作相关的属性束名称。当重新生成历史时，将使用新的输入值。

In the History Manager, you can right-click on an operation, select "Inquire" and click on its "parametric data" field to see the input fields that drive the operation. Examining the command template associated with a history operation is another way to learn about the types of inputs that drive the operation and the field numbers used to identify the input. For example, field 5 of the "Activate Alternate Component" operation is the field that contains the name of the alternate component. Assume a history has an operation named "AltComp1_Activate" that activates a specified alternate component. You could use " $" in a Part Table's list of driving parameters. The column under this entry would contain the alternate component name to use for each derivative part. This same technique can be used to change parameters like the "tip angle" of a hole feature, or the name of an attribute bundle associated with an operation. When the history is regenerated, it will use the new input values.

When the Part Library is invoked in part edit mode ( Utilities > Part Library), the new part is inserted in the active part as a component, unless the new part is derived from the same seed part as the active part. In this case, you are check the Change Component option to regenerate the active part with driving parameters selected for the new part. Or use the Adjust Component option to modify the driving parameters of an existing part, as opposed to always creating a new part. Degree Refers to the degree of the equation that defines the curve. Curves of a lesser degree are less exact and require less storage and computation time. 使用HTML页面生成对话框，从已安装可用的VRML插件的任何网页浏览器浏览的激活部分，创建HTML/网页文件（.htm)。HTML/网页文件将包含如展示装配零件清单命令所示从零件属性对话框、物料清单（BOM）数据中抽出的属性数据及一个激活零件的VRML图像文件（.wrl)。

Use the HTML Page Generation Form to create an HTML/Web document (.htm) from the active part that can be viewed with any web browser that has a VRML plug-in installed. The HTML/Web document will contain attribute data extracted from the Part Attributes Form, bill of materials (BOM) data as shown by the Show Assembly Parts List command, and a VRML image file (.wrl) of the active part.

The .htm files will be saved to and viewed from the Physical Path defined in the form. These paths default to those set by the ZW3D Configuration Form. You can override the current configuration paths using this form. The attribute, BOM, VRML, and HTML data will be generated. This may take several minutes. Once complete, your default local web browser is opened and the HTML/Web document is displayed.

包含自定义输入模板的文件必须与该模板的名称相同，且需附加".t"扩展名。如果不这样设定，那么在需要重新评估由模板定义的任何操作时，中望3D将会找不到模板。模板文件应位于由中望3D（即列于中望3D 搜索路径对话框)的默认目录之一，或应嵌于自定义特征的父零件内。参见将文件嵌入零件的链接管理器。

The file containing a Custom Input template must be named the same as the template with the ".t" extension appended to it. If not, ZW3D will not find the template when it needs to re-evaluate any operations defined by the template. The template file must reside in one of the default directories searched by ZW3D (i.e., those listed in the ZW3D Search Path Form), or it must be embedded in the custom feature's parent part. Refer to the Link Manager for embedding files into a part.

使用此命令，将一组历史操作绑定到一个操作中。所有的操作作为历史中一个单一条目的“子操作”。此“单一条目”称为自定义特征。它成为用于定义自定义特征的后续操作的“封装”。可创建一个自定义特征库，执行由用户输入的参数化驱动的设计任务。

Use this command to bundle a group of history operations into one operation. All of the operations are made "sub-operations" of a single entry in the history. This "single entry" is called a Custom Feature. It becomes the "wrapper" for the subsequent operations used to define the Custom Feature. You can create a library of Custom Features to perform design tasks that are parametrically driven by user input.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
当重新生成自定义特征时，所有与其相关的子操作也自动重新生成。然而，它们不能单独被重新定义或删除。如果要执行这样的操作，必须使用炸开自定义特征命令，将操作从一个单一的自定义特征操作，转为操作的原始列表。

When the Custom Feature is regenerated, all of the sub-operations associated with it are regenerated automatically. However, they cannot be individually redefined or deleted. To do that, you have to use the Explode Custom Feature command to convert from the single Custom Feature operation to the original list of operations.

第一个所选的操作应该为一个自定义输入操作，用于在自定义特征中驱动后续的操作。所有用于定义自定义特征的操作，应该仅从自定义输入操作或它们互相之间来引用输入。这意味着自定义特征是“自给式”的，可被拷贝并粘贴入其它的零件，并成功地重新生成。

The first operation selected should be a Custom Input operation whose inputs are used to drive the subsequent operations in the Custom Feature. All of the operations used to define the Custom Feature should only reference input from the Custom Input operation or from each other. This means that the Custom Feature is considered "self-contained" and can be Cut and Pasted into another part and regenerated successfully.

选择是或否对自定义特征强制一个单独的显示更新。当它启用时，在重新生成一个自定义特征后，将会有一个重绘操作更新显示。如果它是禁用的，屏幕上可能会有多个增量更新，这取决于自定义特征进行了何种编辑。应该决定哪种显示更新的方法对应用更加有效。

When the Custom Feature is created, its sub-operations disappear from the History Manager while the Custom Input operation remains visible. When the Custom Input operation is regenerated or redefined, the sub-operations associated with it are automatically regenerated. If one of the sub-operations fails to regenerate, the Custom Feature operation fails.

为自定义特征库选择一个文件。 自定义特征可以存储于任何零件或Z3文件中。不论选择什么文件，请保持一致性，并将所有的自定义特征存储在相同的文件中。此文件将成为自定义特征库。此文件不需要包含任何有用的零件或图纸。当创建该文件时，从创建新文件的对象对话框选择多对象图标。使用这种方式，甚至不需要创建一个根对象。

Choosing a file for your Custom Feature library Custom Features can be stored in any part or ZW3D file. Whatever file you choose, be consistent and store all of your Custom Features in the same file. This file will become your Custom Feature library. The file does not need to contain any usable parts or drawings. When you create the file, select the Multi-Object icon from the Create New File/Object Form. That way you will not even have to create a root object.

A Custom Feature operation can be defined using a ZW3D macro by including the name of the macro in the command template that defines the Custom Input operation. See Macro Defined Custom Features for more information.

使用这个命令从ZW3D标准零件库中插入一个模架。目前支持的类型包括DME A和B系列、HASCO 1型和Futaba。其他的模架库将会陆续添加。也可以通过实用工具>零件库这个命令，从ZW3D安装目录的/part_libraries文件夹里的ZW3D零件库中插入标准零件。该目录包含ANSI与DME标准部件。

Use this command to insert a mold base from the ZW3D standard parts library. Currently, DME A and B Series, HASCO Type 1 and Futaba mold bases are supported. Additional mold base libraries are added regularly. You can also use Utilities > Part Library to insert standard parts from ZW3D Part Library files located in the /part_libraries directory of your ZW3D installation folder. This folder contains ANSI and DME standard components.

Use this command to analyze the tangent continuity across two mating faces at a selected edge. The edge must be shared by both faces. 当曲线是一条边时，会引用一条小线到草图而不是一个点。线的端点是与草图平面相交的点。线的长度没有意义，但线的方向与平面和与边相邻的面相交的曲线相切。如果边有一个以上的相邻面，选择其中一个面。 当与命令一起，创建与现有面保持相切的扫掠特征时，这种方法特别有用。 使用选项(如上) 选择一个显示方法（边上的切线或切点）。

When the curve is an edge, a small line is referenced into the sketch and not a point. The endpoint of the line is the point of intersection with the sketch plane. The length of the line has no meaning, but the direction of the line is the tangent to the intersection curve between the plane and the face neighboring the edge. If the edge has more than one neighboring face, one of the faces is chosen. This is especially useful when used in conjunction with the commands to create a swept feature that will remain tangent with an existing face. Use the option (see above) to select the method of display (tangent line at edge or point at edge.)

ZW3D provides advanced session management features that are only available when the "Enable session management?" option on the Files tab of the ZW3D Configuration Form is enabled. By default, session management is not enabled. The session management functions are grouped together and can be accessed (when active) by selecting File > Manage Session.

ZW3D session management extends the basic file management functions by allowing you to backup, clear, restore, open, delete and save your active session. Other functions are also available. It is highly recommended that you become familiar with basic ZW3D operations before using the advanced session management functions. Also review the reference topics listed below before continuing.

使用此命令，检查所有激活进程访问的文件，查看从激活进程第一次映射它们之后，它们是否被更新过（被其他进程更新）。如果有更新，删除该文件的任何增量更新，该进程重新映射更新过的文件。系统将报告与激活进程不同步的文件名称与数目（例如：从激活进程开始使用这些文件开始，文件的数目发生了改变）。

This command checks all the files accessed by the active session to see if any of them have been updated (by another session) since the active session first mapped them. If so, any incremental edits to the files are deleted and the session re-maps the updated files. The names and number of files (if any) that were out-of-sync with the active session (i.e., the number of files modified since the active session started using them) are reported.

如果定位了任何过时的文件引用，系统为了与新文件保持同步，将备份激活进程，并删除在该点积累的撤消/重做数据。在同步文件的时候，如果激活目标对象的路径经过任何从过时文件读出的对象，系统将提示退出激活文件，然后重新执行此命令。

If any out-of-date file references are located, the active session will be backed up and the undo/redo data accumulated to that point is deleted in order to re-synchronize with the new files. At the time of file synchronization, if the path to the active target object passes through any objects that were read from out-of-sync files, you will be prompted to exit the active file and then execute this command again.

在一个进程的过程中，每次对象数据访问一个文件时，系统将执行检查，查看当进程使用该文件时，它是否被修改过。如修改过，系统将提示一个信息，通知该文件已经发生改变，你应该同步新的文件。当你点击消息窗口中的“继续”按钮时，系统将记录一个事件，强制退出当前命令，并退出激活文件。

Each time a file is accessed for object data during a session, a check is made to see if the file has been changed while the session was using it. If so, a message is displayed informing you that the file has been changed and that you should synchronize with the new file. When you press the "Continue" button on the message window, an event is logged to force the current command to exit and to back out of the active file.

当一个进程是打开时，它也被锁定了，所以其他的中望3D实例不能尝试开始编辑相同的进程，否则会很容易破坏数据。当你退出中望3D时，进程上的锁就释放了。如果中望3D是非正常退出（如：系统崩溃或按Ctrl+C），锁文件仍然保持在进程目录中。如果中望3D从带有激活锁的与中望3D调用的用户目录关联的进程数据重启，系统将显示下列信息： 激活的中望3D用户目录标记为正在使用。 这可能是由于上一次中望3D进程非正常退出导致的。 真正地同时使用相同的工作区域会破坏它。 你要继续吗？ 是 - 锁被重写，风险自负！否 - 中望3D正常退出。

When a session is opened it is also locked so that another instance of ZW3D cannot try to begin editing the same session which can easily corrupt data. When you exit ZW3D the lock on the session is released. If ZW3D is prematurely aborted (e.g. a system crash or Ctrl+C), the lock file remains in the session directory. If ZW3D is restarted with an active lock on the session data associated with the user directory from which ZW3D was invoked, the following message is displayed: The active ZW3D user directory is flagged as in-use. This may be due to a premature exit from the last ZW3D session. True simultaneous use of the same work area could corrupt it. Do you want to continue ? Yes - the lock is overridden, at your own risk! No - ZW3D exits gracefully.

A custom feature operation can be defined using a macro by including the name of the macro in the command template that defines the custom operation. The ".mac" extension must be appended to the macro name in order for ZW3D to recognize it. ZW3D will search the default directories until it finds a macro with the specified name. It will launch the macro and will pass the index of the custom feature operation to the macro as its first argument.

The first step taken in the macro should be to pass this index to the "!CdFtrActivate" command to "activate" the custom feature during macro execution. History operations created by the macro will be assigned to the "active" feature as sub-operations.

当重新生成一个基于宏的自定义特征时，将删除以前与该自定义特征关联的子操作，并重新执行该宏来重新生成这些子操作。系统假设：用于定义一个自定义特征的模板和宏，都位于其中一个中望3D搜索的默认目录中，其中包括用“搜索路径”（如：_paths）定义的路径。当转移一个包含自定义特征的零件时，相关模板和宏文件必须一起转移，没有它们，零件重新生成操作将失败。

When a macro-based custom feature is regenerated, the sub-operations previously associated with the custom feature are deleted and the macro is re-executed to regenerate the sub-operations. The template and macro used to define a custom feature are assumed to reside in one of the default directories searched by ZW3D. This includes the directories defined with "File/Search Path" (i.e. paths). When a part containing custom features is transported, the associated template and macro files must be transported with it. Without them, part regeneration will fail.

一个宏生成的自定义特征不应停止交互输入和提示交互输入。它应该完全由启动宏的命令模板定义的输入进行驱动。使用宏命令[vxFtrInput]查询由驱动特征（如：传递给宏的自定义特征）收集的输入数据（如：VDATA），或使用“<feature_name,field_id>”语法作为下游操作的输入来关联引用输入数据。

A macro-generated custom feature should not stop and prompt for interactive input. It should be entirely driven by the inputs defined by the command template that launches the macro. Use the macro command [vxFtrInput] to query the input data (i.e. VDATA) gathered by the driving feature (i.e. the custom feature passed to the macro) or associatively reference input data using the " feature_name,field_id" syntax as input to downstream operations.

在创建一个自定义特征的过程中，当历史操作由宏进行定义时（见!CdFtrActivate），系统将根据计数器向这些操作分配了一个唯一的ID，该计数器每当添加一个操作时将递增。如果一个宏定义的自定义特征用一个不同的操作编号重新生成，实体的唯一id可能会变化，这会导致引用这些实体的下游操作失败。如果操作id使用[vxOpId]进行智能分配，那么实体id的重新生成可变得更加稳定。

When history operations are defined by a macro during the creation of a custom feature (see !CdFtrActivate), they are assigned a unique id that is based on a counter that is incremented each time an operation is added. If a macro-defined custom feature is regenerated with a different number of operations, entity unique id's may change. This can cause downstream operations that reference the entities to fail. The regeneration of entity id's can be made more stable if operation id's are assigned intelligently using [vxOpId].

If the "$report" command is followed by a file name, event information will be output to the specified file instead of to the message window.

此处的示例历史树，显示了从名为MyPin的自定义输入操作衍生而来的三个操作。前两个造型操作Cylinder1_Base和Cylinder2_Base包含从MyPin继承而来的输入。第三个操作Boolean1_Add把两个造型连接成最终的销。这四个操作用于创建一个自定义特征。

The example history tree here shows three operations that are derived from the Custom Input operation called MyPin. The first two shape operations Cylinder1_Base and Cylinder2_Base contain inputs derived from MyPin. The third operation Boolean1_Add joins the two shapes into the final pin. These four operations are used to create a Custom Feature.

搜索活动零件中名为"Variable->Name"的变量。指定变量的值以数据库单位（mm、deg）通过"Variable->Value"输出。如果"Variable->Name"是字符串变量，则相关文本通过"Variable->Expression"输出。超过256字节的字符串将被截断。注意："Variable->Expression"不用于输出定义变量的表达式，而是用于输出与"string"变量相关的文本。变量数据

Searches the active part for the variable named "Variable->Name". The value of the specified variable is output via "Variable->Value" in database units (mm, deg). If "Variable->Name" is a string variable, the associated text is output via "Variable->Expression". Strings longer than 256 bytes are truncated. note: "Variable->Expression" is not used to output the expression that defines a variable. It is used to output text associated with a "string" variable.
Variable variable data

激活由"文件"和"根"指定的根对象作为目标对象，并将有关当前目标对象的信息备份到内部堆栈（最多16次调用）。此函数将在内存中激活指定的文件，并激活目标对象。cvxFileActivate()将激活文件并在窗口中打开它。当使用"File=NULL"和"Root=NULL"调用此函数时，将恢复堆栈上的最后一个目标对象。调用应用程序必须可靠地配对调用此函数以设置和恢复目标对象。当使用"File=*"和"Name=NULL"调用此函数时，将清除堆栈。例如：...(编码) cvxRootActivate2(File,Name); ...(编码) ...(在当前环境中不需要执行任何代码时，需要再次调用接口关闭文件) cvxRootActivate2(NULL,NULL); ...(编码) 注意：如果未调用cvxRootActivate2(NULL,NULL)，可能会发生不可预测的错误。文件根对象文件名称根对象名称evxErrors cvxRootActivate2(const vxLongPath File, const vxRootName Name)

Activates the root object specified by "File" and "Root" as the target object and backs up information about the current target object to an internal stack (up to 16 calls deep). This function will activate the specified file in the memory and the target object will be activated. cvxFileActivate() will activate the file and open it in the window. When this function is called with "File=NULL" and "Root=NULL", the last target object on the stack is restored. The calling application MUST reliably pair calls to this function to set and restore target objects. When this function is called with "File="*" and "Name=NULL", the stack is cleared. for example: ...(coding) cvxRootActivate2(File,Name); ...(coding) ...(when no code is needed to execute in the current environment, the interface closure file needs to be called again) cvxRootActivate2(NULL,NULL); ...(coding) note: If cvxRootActivate2(NULL,NULL) is not called,unpredictable errors can occur.
File root object file
Name root object name
evxErrors cvxRootActivate2(const vxLongPath File, const vxRootName Name)

将指定的根对象从"SourceFile"复制到"DestFile"。两个文件必须已经存在，并且必须驻留在"vxpaths"中指定的一个目录中（参见cvxPathAdd()和cvxPathSearchFirst()）。通常情况下，当复制根对象时，复制对象中的唯一ID与原始对象相同。当"UpdateUid=1"时，复制对象的唯一ID将被更新，使其与原始对象不同。除非您有特定目的要生成具有不同唯一ID的副本，否则应输入"UpdateUid=0"。在正常使用中，ZW3D能够区分复制对象中的实体与原始对象中的实体，而不更改唯一ID。SourceFile：要复制的文件名SourceName：源文件中根对象的名称DestFile：要复制到的文件名DestName：要分配的复制根对象的名称Overwrite 0 = 升级DestName以避免命名冲突，1 = 在覆盖现有对象之前提示，-1 = 自动覆盖现有对象UpdateUid 1 = 使复制的几何图形的UID唯一，否则为0evxErrors cvxRootCopy(const vxLongPath SourceFile, const vxRootName SourceName, const vxLongPath DestFile, vxRootName DestName, int Overwrite, int UpdateUid)

Copies the specified root object from "SourceFile" to "DestFile". Both files must already exist and must reside in one of the directories specified in "vxpaths" (see cvxPathAdd() and cvxPathSearchFirst()). Normally, when a root object is copied, the unique id's in the copied object are the same as the original object. When "UpdateUid=1", the the unique id's of the copied object are updated so they are different from the original object. You should input "UpdateUid=0", unless you have a specific purpose for generating copies with different unique id's. In normal usage, ZW3D is able to differentiate entities in a copied object from the original object without changing unique id's.
SourceFile name of file to copy from
SourceName name of root object in source file
DestFile name of file to copy to
DestName name to assign copied root object
Overwrite 0 = upgrade DestName to avoid naming conflict, 

 1 = prompt before overwriting existing object. 

 -1 = automatically overwrite existing object.
UpdateUid 1 to make UID's of copied geometry unique, else 0
evxErrors cvxRootCopy(const vxLongPath SourceFile, const vxRootName SourceName, const vxLongPath DestFile, vxRootName DestName, int Overwrite, int UpdateUid)

重命名给定的文件和/或根对象。如果未指定新文件名或新根对象名，则该函数不执行任何操作并返回ZW_API_INVALID_INPUT。在活动文件和活动文件引用的文件中，更新对给定名称的引用以使用新名称。使用此函数重命名根对象会清除对象的描述。有关可以在重命名根对象时分配描述的函数，请参阅cvxRootRename2()。重命名文件时，将使用新名称保存每个文件的新副本，而不是实际更改原始文件的名称。如果fDelOriginal参数为1，则此函数将删除已创建新文件的原始文件。如果fDelOriginal为0，则将保留原始文件。如果发生错误，则在此函数返回时，某些文件和对象可能已重命名，而其他文件可能仍具有其原始名称。
计算每个输入数组中名称的数量
FileName数组中的“Count”文件名或完整路径以进行重命名。需要重命名的每个文件必须将文件名或完整路径添加到数组中。

NewRootName数组中的“Count”新根对象名称，可以为NULL。如果未为多对象文件指定新根对象名称，则默认情况下使用原始根对象名称。单对象文件不需要指定。
fDelOriginal 1表示重命名后删除原始文件，0表示保留原始文件

Rename the given files and/or root objects. If neither the new file name nor the new root object name is specified, the function does nothing and returns ZW_API_INVALID_INPUT. In the active file and files referenced by the active file, references to the given names are updated to use the new names. Renaming a root object with this function clears the object's description. Refer to cvxRootRename2() for a function that can assign a description to a root object while renaming it. When files are renamed, a new copy of each file is saved using the new name rather than actually changing the name of the original file. If the fDelOriginal argument is 1, this function deletes the original files for which new files have been created. If fDelOriginal is 0, the original files are preserved. If a n error does occur, some files and objects might be renamed and others might still have their original names when this function returns.
Count the number of names in each input array
FileName array of "Count" file names or full paths to rename. each file that needs to be renamed must have add file name or full path to the array.
RootName array of "Count" root object names to rename, may be NULL. multi-objects files must specify the root object to be renamed. single-object files do not need to be specified.
NewFileName array of "Count" new file names or full paths, may be NULL. if don't specify new file name, the original file name is used by default. single-object file should always specify new file name.
NewRootName array of "Count" new root object names, may be NULL. if no new root object name is specified for multi-objects file, the original root object name is used by default. single-object files do not need to be specified.
fDelOriginal 1 to delete original files after renaming, 0 to keep them
evxErrors cvxRootRenameMulti(int Count, const vxPath *FileName, const vxRootName *RootName, const vxPath *NewFileName, const vxRootName *NewRootName, int fDelOriginal)

Updates the variables (e.g. dimensions, parameters) specified by "Variables" in the specified root object within the active file. The root object is then regenerated. You can disable the object regeneration normally performed by this function by inputing "Working = -1". A field of a history operation's input data is identified by a variable name encoded as follows (brackets included): with the new attribute value or data assigned to the "Expression" field of the "svxVariable" data structure. using a variable name composed from "part_" and a user-data label. For example, if an item of user data were labeled "my_data", the corresponding variable name would be "part_my_data". The new user data would be defined via the "Expression" field of the "svxVariable" data structure. <operation_name:field_number> part_number, part_class, part_designer, part_cost, part_supplier part_description, part_keyword, part_manager, part_material The part "density" attribute is modified via the variable name "part_density". The new density (kg/mm3) is defined via the "Value" field of the "svxVariable" data structure. The color of all faces in a part may be modified via the "part_color" variable with "Expression" set to "Aluminum", "Brass", "Bronze", "Copper", "Silver", "Steel", "Stainless", "Gold", "Gray", "Red", "Green", "Blue", "Brown", "Orange" or RGB values (0-255) encoded as "R.G.B" (e.g. 136.255.0). Custom variables : Expression format of string type :"\"str\""; Expression format of point type :"Point(1,2,3)"; Expression format of vector type :"Vector(1,2,3)"; If the type of variable is set to 0,then the sub_type must be set,else ignore. If the sub_type of variable is set to 1 or 2,then the unit_type must be set,else ignore. evxUnitType for length unit and evxAngUnitType for angle unit.

Outputs an attribute from a specified root. The itemId includes the following items of evxAtItemId: VX_AT_USER VX_AT_NAME VX_AT_NUMBER VX_AT_DESIGNER VX_AT_MANAGER VX_AT_SUPPLIER VX_AT_KEYWORD VX_AT_DESCRIPT VX_AT_START VX_AT_END When itemId is VX_AT_USER, the name of the user-defined attribute must be assigned to at->label before calling this function. If you want to keep the file open, use the cvxFileKeep() function, before calling this function, to set a flag that prevents cvxRootAtItemGet() and cvxRootAtItemSet() from closing the files that they open. (Files that are already open before cvxRootAtItemGet() or cvxRootAtItemSet() is called are never closed by these functions.) Keeping files open is a more efficient way to access multiple attributes in a file, but you must remember to call cvxFileKeep() again to reset the flag after you have finished your calls to cvxRootAtItemGet() and cvxRootAtItemSet(), and you also become responsible for closing the files, for example by using one of the cvxFileClose() or cvxFileSave() functions.

root root object name (root[0]=0 or NULL for active target object)

at part item attribute

该接口的功能是获取草图所附着的平面。如果附着到草图的平面不存在，则获取原始草图附着的平面的子分割面。cvxSkInqPlane接口可以获取附着到草图的曲面，但一旦附着曲面被分割且原始曲面不存在，则无法获取该接口。cvxSkInqPlanes接口具有cvxSkInqPlane接口的所有功能，当cvxSkInqPlane无法获取平面时，cvxSkInqPlanes接口可以获取原始平面的子分割平面。
草图id
idFaces计数
idFaces列表
evxErrors cvxSkInqPlanes(int idSketch, int *count, int **idFaces)

The function of this interface is to obtain the plane on which the sketch is attached. If the plane attached to the sketch does not exist, the split sub face of the plane attached to the original sketch is obtained. The cvxSkInqPlane interface can obtain the surface attached to the sketch, but once the attached surface is divided and the original surface does not exist, the interface cannot be obtained. The cvxSkInqPlanes interface has all the function of the interfaced cvxSkInqPlane, and when the cvxSkInqPlane cannot obtain the plane, the cvxSkInqPlanes interface can obtain the sub split plane of the original plane.
idSketch id of sketch
count count of idFaces
idFaces list of idFace
evxErrors cvxSkInqPlanes(int idSketch, int *count, int **idFaces)

此函数显示指定的 GUI 表单，并等待用户在表单上按下"确定"、"应用"或"取消"按钮。如果用户按下"取消"，则返回 0；如果用户按下"确定"，则返回 1；如果用户按下"应用"，则返回 2。如果要使表单上的另一个小部件导致 cvxFormWait() 返回，请将调用 cvxFormWaitExit() 的回调函数附加到该小部件。cvxFormWaitExit() 被调用时传递的任何整数值都将被此函数返回。如果按下"确定"或"取消"，GUI 表单将自动取消显示。如果此函数返回是因为用户按下"应用"或因为调用了 cvxFormWaitExit()，则 GUI 表单将保持显示，直到调用应用程序使用 cvxFormKill() 取消显示它。注意：cvxFormKill() 可以应用于已经取消显示的表单，而不会产生任何不良后果。

This function displays the specified GUI form and waits for the user to press the "Okay", "Apply" or "Cancel" button on the form. It returns 0 if the user pressed "Cancel", 1 if the user pressed "Okay" or 2 if the user pressed "Apply". If you want to cause another widget on the form to cause cvxFormWait() to return, attach a callback function that invokes cvxFormWaitExit() to the widget. Whatever integer value is passed to cvxFormWaitExit() will be returned by this function. If "Okay" or "Cancel" are pressed, the GUI form is automatically undisplayed. If this functions returns because the user pressed "Apply" or because cvxFormWaitExit() was called, the GUI form remains displayed until the calling application undisplays it using cvxFormKill(). note: cvxFormKill() can be applied to a form that has already been undisplayed without any bad consequences.
Form GUI form name (null-terminated ascii string)
int cvxFormWait(char *Form)

Encodes the data associated with the specified GUI form in a null-terminated ascii string. Memory for the output string is allocated by this function and should be deallocated by the calling procedure. Only field items numbered 1 or more are encoded. The string has the following format: Version,FormName,Field_Id,ItemCnt,IsOn,ItemData,IsOn,ItemData..., Field_Id,ItemCnt,... It is assumed no item exceeds 1024 bytes in its text-encoded form. If a field is flagged with the "is_distance" option, the text string associated with it is converted from user to database units if the string contains a constant value.
Form GUI form name
Data GUI data encoded in a null-terminated string

初始化一个用于选择字体的输入字段。此函数用于在初始化表单时使用。它可以在GUI表单的初始化过程中调用，也可以在“Options”表单的“init_after”回调函数中调用。假设表单有一个选项（整数）字段“idField”，该字段具有组合框小部件。组合框列表的任何先前内容都将被丢弃，并且组合框列表将填充为当前在本地计算机上可用的字体名称。如果“Name”是一个非空字符串，与其中一个字体的名称匹配，那么该字体将成为组合框中的默认选择。要将此函数应用于“Options”表单，请将“Form”参数的值设为“OptForm”。建议表单的字段“idField”应引用全局变量“VgRdTxtFont”以保存所选项目的索引。这将使默认字体选择与本机ZW3D命令中的字体选择字段同步。如果找到与“Name”匹配的字体，则此函数将更新“VgRdTxtFont”。如果“Name”不匹配任何字体名称，则当前的“VgRdTxtFont”值将选择组合框列表中的默认项目。在处理“Options”表单时，管理字体输入字段的通常做法是使用具有字体名称的组合框的选项字段，并在表单的数据容器中使用隐藏文本字段来保存所选字体的名称。在表单的“init_after”回调中，使用隐藏字段的内容作为“Name”参数调用此函数。在表单的“function”回调中，查询所选项目的文本组合框，将文本保存到隐藏字段中，并在需要字体名称的地方使用该文本。如果无法查询组合框，因为“Options”表单未激活（例如在重新生成期间），则使用先前保存在隐藏字段中的任何文本作为字体名称。例如，“init_after”回调可能包括以下代码片段，用于初始化字段5中的字体选择组合框，并使用隐藏文本字段4中可能包含的先前选择的字体名称（数据容器由“idData”指定）。注意：如果字段4不存在，则字体名称将为空字符串。

Initializes an input field for selecting a font. This function is intended for use when initializing a form. It can be called during initialization of a GUI form or from the "init_after" callback function of an "Options" form. It is assumed the form has an option (integer) field "idField" that has a combo box widget. Any prior contents of the combo box list are discarded, and the combo box list is filled with the names of fonts currently available on the local computer. If "Name" is a non-empty string that matches the name of one of those fonts, that font becomes the default selection in the combo box. To apply this function to an "Options" form, input "OptForm" as the value of the "Form" argument. It is recommended that the form's field "idField" should reference the global variable "VgRdTxtFont" to hold the index of the selected item. This will synchronize the default font selection with the font selection fields in native ZW3D commands. This function updates "VgRdTxtFont" if a match to "Name" is found. If "Name" does not match any font name, the current value of "VgRdTxtFont" selects the default item in the combo box list. When working with an "Options" form, the usual practice for managing a font input field is to use an option field having a combo box for the font names, and to use a hidden text field in the form's data container to hold the name of the selected font. In the form's "init_after" callback, call this function with the contents of the hidden field as the "Name" argument. In the form's "function" callback, query the combo box for the text of the selected item, save the text to the hidden field, and use the text wherever the font name is needed. If the combo box cannot be queried because the "Options" form is not active (such as during regeneration), use whatever text was previously saved in the hidden field as the font name. For example, an "init_after" callback might include this snippet of code to initialize a font selection combo box in field 5, with a hidden text field 4 that might contain the name of a previously selected font (the data container is specified by "idData"). note: The font name will be an empty string if field 4 does not exist:
Form GUI form name
idField id of form field for font combo box
Name name of default font, may be NULL
hasZwFont judge if fonts have ZW fonts.1:include ZW fonts,0:no ZW fonts
evxErrors cvxFieldInitFont(const char *Form, int idField, const char *Name, int hasZwFont)

Displays the specified "prompt" and waits for the user to select a point based on the input option (evxPntInpOpt). This function is especially designed to manage the selection of points on entities that lie outside of the active target object, such as a point on a face of an assembly component. Your objective may be to get the coordinates of a point that lies external to the active object (e.g. part), the pick-path of an external entity (e.g. an assembly face), or both. The selected point's coordinates are output in the local space of the point's parent entity. "Matrix" may be used to transform the point (and entity) coordinates from their local space to the space of the target object that was active at the time the point was selected (see cvxPntTransform(), cvxCrvTransform()and cvxSrfTransform()). If the point was selected by snapping to an entity, the pick-path of the entity is output via "EntPath". A pick-path defines the sequence of object references (i.e. nested assembly components) that locate the entity relative to the active target object. A pick-path could lead to an entity that lies in a different file or object than the active file/object. API functions for querying entities generally require that an entity's parent file and object(i.e. part, sketch, plan, drawing) be active. If you want to query information about an entity, such as its geometry, use cvxEntPathActivate() to activate the entity's parent file and object, and to get the entity's id. Query the geometry and, if desired, transform it into the space of the original target object using "Matrix". When you are done querying the geometry, restore the original target file and object with cvxEntPathActivate().

To initialize the file browser to both a default directory and file selection, input "Default" as the desired directory, followed by a comma, followed by the desired file name. note: The path of the file selected by the user is output via the string variable "Path". If there is an error, or the user presses cancel, an empty string is output. "Path" must reference 512 bytes of memory. Better to use cvxGetFileByLongPath(), this function needs to set the length of the path. see: cvxGetFileActiveField().

类似于cvxGetFile()，此函数旨在在表单打开且字符串字段处于活动状态时使用。文件浏览器使用活动字段的文件路径的父文件夹进行初始化。如果活动字段为空，则使用"默认"文件夹字符串初始化文件浏览器。当文件浏览器打开时，向用户显示指定的"提示"，并且浏览器显示"筛选器"指定的文件。有关"筛选器"字符串语法的更多信息，请参阅cvxGetFile()。用户关闭文件浏览器时，选择的文件路径将发送到活动字段。如果用户取消浏览器，或发生错误，则不更改活动字段。如果"Open = 1"，则文件浏览器将配置为选择要打开的文件。如果"Open = 0"，则文件浏览器将配置为选择或命名要保存的文件。如果文件已存在，将要求用户确认是否替换文件。如果"提示"、"默认"或"筛选器"参数为NULL，则将提供默认值。当"Open"为1时，默认筛选器允许选择任何文件，但当"Open"为0时，调用方应始终提供筛选器，尽管在这种情况下，此函数也将在必要时使用默认值，猜测要保存的文件类型。在保存时（"Open"为0），文件浏览器可以配置为显示默认文件夹，并预先选择指定的文件。方法是将所需文件夹的路径分配给"默认"，后跟逗号，后跟所需文件名。与cvxGetFile()函数不同，此函数不允许多个选择。用户关闭文件浏览器时，只会将单个文件选择发送到活动字段。此函数特别有助于实现命令函数，当用户激活字符串输入字段时自动显示文件浏览器。例如，显示文件浏览器以打开文本文件的函数可能如下所示：并在使用cvxCmdFunc()函数安装具有相同名称的符号后，可以通过在字符串字段的选项属性中使用波浪符号前缀符号名称来引用它：~TextFileCb，参见：cvxGetFile()。打开1以打开文件，0以保存文件提示空终止文本提示默认默认目录（空终止字符串）筛选器文件筛选器（空终止字符串）void cvxGetFileActiveField(int Open，const char *Prompt，const char *Default，const char *Filter)

Similar to cvxGetFile(), this function is intended for use when a form is open and a string field is active. The file browser is initialized using the parent folder of the file path from the active field. If the active field is empty, the file browser is initialized using the "Default" folder string. The specified "Prompt" is shown to the user when the file browser opens, and the browser displays the files specified by "Filter". Refer to cvxGetFile() for more information about the syntax of the "Filter" string. When the user closes the file browser, the path to the file selected by the user is sent to the active field. If the user cancels the browser, or if an error occurs, the active field is not changed. If "Open = 1", the file browser will be configured to select a file to be opened. If "Open = 0", the file browser will be configured to select or name a file to be saved. If the file already exists, the user will be asked to confirm that the file is to be replaced. A default will be provided if the "Prompt", "Default" or "Filter" argument is NULL. When "Open" is 1, the default filter allows any file to be selected, but when "Open" is 0 the caller should always provide the filter, although this function will use a default in this case, too, if necessary guessing at the type of file to be saved. When saving ("Open" is 0), the file browser can be configured to show a default folder and also pre-select a specified file. Do this by assigning the path to the desired folder to "Default", followed by a comma, followed by the desired file name. Unlike the cvxGetFile() function, this function does not allow multiple selections. Only a single file selection is sent to the active field when the user closes the file browser. This function is particularly helpful for implementing command functions that automatically display the file browser when the user activates a string input field. For example, a function that displays the file browser to open a text file might look like this: and after installing a symbol with the same name as the function, using the cvxCmdFunc() function, it can be referenced in the string field's options property by preceding the symbol name with a tilde character: ~TextFileCb, see: cvxGetFile().

Displays a dialogue for browsing and selecting a file folder. This function grabs all events and does not return until "OK" or "Cancel" is selected. The path of the folder selected by the user is output via the string variable "Path". If there is an error, or the user presses cancel, an empty string is output. It is assumed that "Path" references sufficient memory to hold the output path (max = 512 bytes). A Path that is too long (longer than "sizePath") is truncated. It is assumed that the input "Path" is no longer than 512 bytes. see: cvxGetFolderActiveField().
Prompt prompt displayed on directory browser title bar
Default default folder (null-terminated string)
Path path of selected folder (outputs NULL pointer if "Cancel" is selected)
sizePath max size of path
void cvxGetFolderByLongPath(const char *Prompt, char *Default, char *Path, int sizePath)

Similar to cvxGetFolder(), this function is intended for use when a form is open and a string field is active. The folder browser is initialized using the path found in the active field. If the active field is empty, the folder browser is initialized using the "Default" folder string. The specified "Prompt" is shown to the user when the folder browser opens. When the user closes the folder browser, the path to the folder selected by the user is sent to the active field. If the user cancels the browser, or if an error occurs, the active field is not changed. If the "Prompt" or "Default" argument is NULL, a default will be provided. This function is particularly helpful for implementing command functions that automatically display the folder browser when the user activates a string input field. For example, a function that displays the browser for selecting an output folder might look like this: and after installing a symbol with the same name as the function, using the cvxCmdFunc() function, it can be referenced in the string field's options property by preceding the symbol name with a tilde character: ~OutputDirCb, see: cvxGetFolder().
Prompt prompt displayed on folder browser title bar
Default default folder (null-terminated string)
void cvxGetFolderActiveField(const char *Prompt, const char *Default)

Displays the input message string in a GUI window and waits for a user response based on "Option". Occurrences of the "@" character in the message string will be replaced with a newline character. A numeric value indicating the user's response is returned. Valid options and corresponding return values are shown below: Option=1: Display "Continue". Return 1 when the user selects "Continue". Option=2: Display "Yes" and "No". Return 1 for "Yes", 0 for "No". Option=3: Display "Yes", "No" and "Cancel". Return 1 for "Yes", 0 for "No" and -1 for "Cancel". Option=4: Display "Yes", "Yes All", "No" and "Cancel". Return 1 for "Yes", 2 for "Yes All", 0 for "No" and -1 for "Cancel".
Option see "DESCRIPTION"
Message null-terminated text message

将变量值替换为字符串中所有变量引用的出现。每个变量引用的语法为[$VAR]，其中VAR是活动目标中变量的名称。找不到变量的引用将保留在字符串中。此功能不仅限于零件，还可用于活动目标为可能存在变量的任何类型的根对象时。在"Str"字符数组中允许的最大字节数为"nBytes"，包括一个终止的'\0'字节。当此函数返回时，如果带有变量替换的字符串适合此最大大小，则将"Truncated"设置为0。如果变量替换会导致字符串超出此大小，则字符串将被截断，并将"Truncated"设置为1。如果调用者对"Truncated"参数不感兴趣，则可以将NULL传递给它。如果"Str"为NULL或为空，则不会出错，如果字符串中没有[$VAR]引用，则也不会出错，但是如果在活动目标中找不到在这样的引用中指定的变量，则会出错。参见：cvxPartVarSubstituteResize()，用于类似功能的函数，它永远不会截断，而是调整字符串大小。
Str空终止字符串，可以为NULL
nBytes Str数组的最大字节数
Truncated如果字符串被截断则为1，如果没有则为0；可以为NULL
evxErrors cvxPartVarSubstitute(char *Str, int nBytes, int *Truncated)

Substitute variable values into a string for all occurrences of variable references. The syntax for each variable reference is [$VAR] where VAR is the name of a variable in the active target. References for which the variable cannot be found are left in the string. This function is not limited to parts, but can be used when the active target is any type of root object in which variables may exist. The maximum number of bytes allowed in the "Str" character array is "nBytes" including a terminating '\0' byte. When this function returns, "Truncated" is set to 0 if the string with variable substitutions fits within this maximum size. If a variable substitution would cause the string to exceed this size, the string is truncated and "Truncated" is set to 1. The caller may pass NULL in place of the "Truncated" argument if this result is not of interest. It is not an error if "Str" is NULL or empty, nor is it an error if the string has no [$VAR] references, but it is an error if a variable specified in such a reference cannot be found in the active target. see: cvxPartVarSubstituteResize() for a similar function that never truncates, but instead resizes a string.
Str null-terminated string, may be NULL
nBytes maximum size of Str array in bytes
Truncated 1 if string was truncated, 0 if not; may be NULL
evxErrors cvxPartVarSubstitute(char *Str, int nBytes, int *Truncated)

将变量值替换为字符串中所有变量引用的出现。每个变量引用的语法为[$VAR]，其中VAR是活动目标中的变量的名称。找不到变量的引用将保留在字符串中。此功能不仅限于零件，还可用于活动目标为可能存在变量的任何类型的根对象时。如果需要，将重新分配字符串以插入变量值。如果“Str”为NULL或为空，或者字符串中没有[$VAR]引用，则不会出错，但是如果在活动目标中找不到在此类引用中指定的变量，则会出错。如果替换变量值会产生更长的字符串，则将重新分配字符串。如果字符串变短或保持相同长度，则不会重新分配字符串。如果用于字符串的内存块大于字符串所需的内存块（即大于字符串中的字节数加1），则此函数可能会使块变小。这是因为重新分配请求仅请求字符串所需的内存量，并且可能不考虑块中未使用的空间。在调用此函数之前，无需为字符串分配比字符串所需的内存更多的内存。参见：cvxPartVarSubstitute()，用于截断字符串而不是调整大小的类似函数。

Substitute variable values into a string for all occurrences of variable references. The syntax for each variable reference is [$VAR] where VAR is the name of a variable in the active target. References for which the variable cannot be found are left in the string. This function is not limited to parts, but can be used when the active target is any type of root object in which variables may exist. The string will be reallocated (if necessary) to insert the variable values. It is not an error if "Str" is NULL or empty, nor is it an error if the string has no [$VAR] references, but it is an error if a variable specified in such a reference cannot be found in the active target. The string is reallocated if substituting the variable values produces a longer string. The string is not reallocated if it becomes shorter or stays the same length. If the block of memory used for the string is larger than needed for the string (i.e. larger than the number of bytes in the string plus 1), this function might make the block smaller. That is because reallocation requests only the amount of memory needed for the string, and might not consider unused space in the block. There is no need to allocate more memory than the string needs before calling this function. see: cvxPartVarSubstitute() for a similar function that truncates a string instead of resizing it.
Str null-terminated string, may be NULL

evxErros cvxUndoRedoMarker(vxName Name)

Creates and logs an undo-redo transaction with a unique name, which is output via "Name". The transaction is essentially empty, but serves as a marker in the undo-redo transaction list. The marker can be passed to cvxUndoRedoTo() to undo or redo all transactions up to, and including, the marker. This function will cause any recently-logged database operations to be flushed to an undo-redo transaction linked to the last-logged transaction. This function assumes "Name" is a character pointer to at least sizeof(vxName) bytes of memory allocated by the calling procedure. see: cvxCmdMarker().
Name name of undo-redo transaction marker

此功能导致后续的撤销重做事务被捆绑成一个事务，并且禁用显示更新。输入数组"Settings"用于备份此功能修改的设置。此功能必须始终与随后的cvxUndoBundleEnd()调用配对，后者需要"Settings"作为输入。如果在调用此功能时未激活自定义操作，则将自动启动新的撤销重做事务。DisableManager为1时禁用Manager表单的更新，否则为0。Settings指向一个包含8个整数的空数组。void cvxUndoBundleStart(int DisableManager, int Settings[])

This function causes subsequent undo-redo transactions to be bundled into one transaction with display update disabled. The input array "Settings" is used to back up settings modified by this function. This function MUST ALWAYS be paired with a subsequent call to cvxUndoBundleEnd() which requires "Settings" as input. If a custom operation is not active at the time this function is called, a new undo-redo transaction will automatically be initiated.
DisableManager 1 to disable update of the Manager form, else 0
Settings pointer to an empty array of 8 integers

Terminates undo-redo transaction bundling initiated by a previous call to cvxUndoBundleStart(). Refreshes the display if "Redraw" is non-zero. This function MUST ALWAYS be paired with a call to cvxUndoBundleStart() and absolutely requires the "Settings" output by cvxUndoBundleStart() as input in order to properly restore the original settings. If a custom operation is not active at the time this function is called, the current undo-redo transaction will be closed.
RefreshDisplay 1 to refresh the display, else 0

isError 1 if there was an error during the transaction, else 0

注意： 当仿真机床没有RTCP, NC代码直接与五轴机床机构和工件在工作台的位置有关，表示工件原点和机床旋转中心的关系。因此，您需要确认工件的位置，测量工件原点和旋转中心的关系，然后在后置处理中设置指定关系来生成正确的NC代码。这样，您依旧可以获取正确的机床仿真结果。

Note: When the simulated machine does not have RTCP, the NC codes are directly related to the structure type of the 5X machine and the position of the workpiece on the table, which indicates the relationship between the workpiece origin and the machine rotation center. Therefore, you need to confirm the position of the workpiece, measure the relationship between its origin and the rotation center, and then set the specific relationship in the post processor to generate the correct NC codes. In this way, you can still get the correct machine simulation result even without RTCP.

Derived Pattern: Users can derive either Number or Spacing value of the pattern feature. There are three options. 
None – Input the Number and Spacing of the pattern feature without deriving, see Figure 61.

Number – Input the Spacing value of the pattern feature, then the pattern number will be derived automatically, see Figure 63.

插削距离：定义进入切削刀轨前螺旋运动的高度和退刀高度。只允许非负值。如果输入正值，切削刀轨之间的链接刀轨会生成在已经加工过的零件面之上，如果输入的值为零，这些连接刀轨会生成在已经加工过的零件面里。在本案例中，我们设置穿越刀轨的进给速度少于切削刀轨的进给速度（见下图），确保加工面上不会留下刀痕。

Floor Clearance: Define the height of the helical move that is used when entering or exiting a cut. Only non-negative values are allowed. If a positive value is entered, repositioning moves between cuts will take place above the already- machined floor. If zero is entered, the tool will drag across the already-machined floor during these moves. In this case, set the Traversal Feed Rate parameter (see the following figure) to be no greater than the cutting feed rate to help ensure more consistent tool marks on the floor.

最终下切步距：使用该功能可以控制最终的材料高度，加工时不需要通过设置小的下切步距来保留更小的材料高度。VoluMill可以有效地加工更大的下切深度， 然后自动按照最终下切步距来重新加工， 从而留下更小高度的材料。通过这样做，刀具可以最大化地移除材料，同时又保证留有较小的材料用于半精加工或精加工。详细请看图26。

Final Step Height: This option is used to control the height of the steps that will remain. Instead of making a shallow depth of cut across the entire part to leave smaller steps, VoluMill first machine larger steps and then automatically re-machine them to leave smaller steps. Thus the tool can remove the bulk of material most efficiently and still leave smaller steps for a semi-finish or finish toolpath. See Figure 26 for details.
